name: cooperation
description:
Cooperation

two-player co-op

a game about a girl and her cloud

player 1 controls the cloud using WASD

player 2 controls the girl using the arrow keys

see how long you can survive!
---


"amazing game!!!" - some random stranger on the internet

"very fun" - my therapist
